metadata.title: CVE-2015-5740 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The net/http library in net/http/transfer.go in Go before 1.4.3 does notproperly parse HTTP headers, which allows remote attackers to conduct HTTPrequest smuggling attacks via a request with two Content-length headers.

criterions.comment: gcc-5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
